product_name: Topeak Aero Wedge iGlow Saddle Pack
long_description: The Aero Wedge iGlow Saddle Pack from Topeak features a bright LED to enhance your visibility, and it has an internal pocket that holds tools away from spare tubes and other delicate items. Red 0.5-watt Super Bright LED features a constant and blinking mode; run time is approximately 50 hrs. in constant mode and 100 hrs. in blinking mode. Quick-Click mount system and seatpost strap attachment. Water-resistant zipper. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility.
short_description: The Aero Wedge iGlow Saddle Pack from Topeak features a bright LED to enhance your visibility, and it has an internal pocket that holds tools away from spare tubes and other delicate items.
